scripts.build:alljs: npm run build:node && npm run build:webpack && cp -v frontend-js/dist/bundle.js public/javascripts/
scripts.watch-js: nodemon -e js --exec "npm run lint && npm run build:alljs && npm start" --ignore bin/ --ignore node_modules/ --ignore bower_components/ --ignore public/ --ignore app.js --ignore frontend-js/dist/ --ignore scss/
scripts.watch-css: nodemon -e scss --exec "npm run build:sass" --ignore node_modules/ --ignore bower_components/ --ignore public/
